data.lyric:
[ti:Favorite Time Of Year]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Favorite Time Of Year - Carrie Underwood (凯莉·安德伍德)
[00:17.80]Break out the tinsel
[00:19.49]Unpack the lights
[00:21.16]We're about to bring on the merry and bright
[00:24.59]I hear those jingle
[00:26.24]Bells in the air
[00:27.98]Ringing out the sound of joy everywhere
[00:31.41]'Tis the season we've been waiting for
[00:35.93]Waiting don't keep me waiting
[00:38.21]Can't you feel it knocking at your door
[00:42.43]Knock knock it's knocking at your door
[00:44.81]Love pouring out like the snow from the sky
[00:48.18]Snuggled up together sitting by the fire
[00:51.56]Oh it's magical it's my favorite time
[00:55.06]Pretty little wishes tied up in a bow
[00:58.21]And every little kiss is like we're underneath the mistletoe
[01:03.03]It's music to my ears
[01:05.22]Christmas is my favorite time of year
[01:15.15]Stockings on chimneys
[01:16.94]Angels on the trees
[01:18.70]Sugar and cinnamon
[01:20.21]It's the little things
[01:22.11]Blankets and movies
[01:23.62]In black and white
[01:25.44]Together they make up this colorful life
[01:28.83]'Tis the season we've been waiting for
[01:33.30]Waiting don't keep me waiting
[01:35.22]Oh can't you feel it knocking at your door
[01:39.88]Knock knock it's knocking on the door
[01:42.42]Love pouring out like the snow from the sky
[01:45.82]Snuggled up together sitting by the fire
[01:48.69]Oh it's magical it's my favorite time
[01:52.52]Pretty little wishes tied up in a bow
[01:55.79]And every little kiss is like we're underneath the mistletoe
[02:00.35]It's music to my ears
[02:02.70]Christmas is my favorite time of year
[02:09.51]Christmas is my favorite time
[02:12.77]Christmas is my favorite time
[02:18.28]Oh don't keep me waiting yeah
[02:29.75]Love pouring out like the snow from the sky
[02:33.07]Snuggled up together sitting by the fire
[02:36.24]Oh it's magical it's my favorite time
[02:39.76]Pretty little wishes tied up in a bow
[02:43.09]And every little kiss is like we're underneath the mistletoe
[02:47.69]It's music to my ears
[02:49.89]Christmas is my favorite time of year
[02:53.85]Christmas is my favorite time
[02:56.72]Christmas is my favorite time of year
[03:05.09]Oh yes it is
data.trans:
[ti:Favorite Time Of Year]
[ar:Carrie Underwood]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:17.80]撕开金箔纸
[00:19.49]拆开灯
[00:21.16]我们将带来欢乐与光明
[00:24.59]我听见叮当作响的铃声
[00:26.24]飘荡在空中
[00:27.98]到处回荡着欢乐的声音
[00:31.41]这是我们一直等到的季节
[00:35.93]静静等待 不要让我漫无目的地等下去
[00:38.21]你是否听见那敲门声
[00:42.43]正在敲你的门
[00:44.81]爱就像从天而降的雪花一般倾泻而出
[00:48.18]依偎在一起 围坐在火堆旁
[00:51.56]奇妙无比 这是我最喜欢的时光
[00:55.06]小小的美好心愿系上蝴蝶结
[00:58.21]每一个浅浅的吻 就仿佛我们伫立在槲寄生花环下
[01:03.03]这是悦耳动听的音乐
[01:05.22]圣诞节是我一年最喜欢的时光
[01:15.15]烟囱上的袜子
[01:16.94]树上的天使
[01:18.70]蜜糖和肉桂
[01:20.21]那些点点滴滴
[01:22.11]毛毯和那些
[01:23.62]黑白电影
[01:25.44]它们一起构成这色彩斑斓的生活
[01:28.83]这是我们一直等到的季节
[01:33.30]静静等待 不要让我漫无目的地等待
[01:35.22]你是否听见那敲门声
[01:39.88]正在敲你的门
[01:42.42]爱就像从天而降的雪花一般倾泻而出
[01:45.82]依偎在一起 围坐在火堆旁
[01:48.69]奇妙无比 这是我最喜欢的时光

[01:55.79]每一个浅浅的吻 就仿佛我们伫立在槲寄生花环下
[02:00.35]这是悦耳动听的音乐
[02:02.70]圣诞节是我一年最喜欢的时光

[02:12.77]圣诞节是我最喜欢的时光
